body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting our customer service. My name is Joshua Bell and I'm with ABC Car Dealership. May I have your name please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Jane Moore.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Jane. How can I assist you today? Can you provide me with your phone number so I can look up your account details?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Jane. And can you also confirm your address with me?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, my address is one two three Main Street, Cityville.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information. Is there a specific issue you are facing with your billing that I can assist with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Yes, I've noticed some discrepancies in my recent statements and it's making me nervous.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Jane. Let me review your account and see how we can resolve this issue for you. Thank you for bringing it to our attention.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time today, Jane. If you have any further questions or require assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out. Have a great day.

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Thank you, Joshua. I appreciate your help. Have a good day too.
